channel.title: Tobacco – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Create Your Own (legal) Blend
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Mix and match single-note tobacco flavor concentrates to come up with your own unique blend.
item.content:encoded: This is your opportunity to climb into the cockpit of our sophisticated on-demand lab. Is she all we claim her to be? Armed with Cloud Chemistry’s proprietary “Custom Handmade-to-Order” eLiquid manufacturing processes, our elite lab techs are at your disposal: Your wish is their command. If you think it, they can mix it. Proceed with caution, however: With great power, comes great responsibility.

item.title: Alpha
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Cavendish tobacco blended with vanilla bourbon and caramel.
item.content:encoded: This recipe exudes sophistication. Nutty cavendish tobacco and smooth vanilla bourbon come together to form a symphony that would have most assuredly earned the admiration of Mozart. Alpha is the preferred blend of gentlemen everywhere for whom making a positive impression on their peers is paramount.

item.title: Synergy
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of peach infused, American long-leaf tobaccos.
item.content:encoded: This blend was inspired by a trip down to Dixie. Synergy is a celebrated blend of peach infused tobaccos. On the front end, you’ll pick up on the sweet and nutty taste of Kentucky tobacco. On the finish, you’ll breathe in the smooth flavor and aroma of Georgia peaches.

item.title: The Duke
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Toasted tobacco, butterscotch, and a hint of vanilla.
item.content:encoded: This signature recipe starts with a warming, toasty tobacco and infuses it with sweet, silky butterscotch-caramel. A delicate dash of vanilla enters the stage to put the finishing flourish on a tour-de-force blend that is sure to intrigue the most discerning tobacco connoisseurs.

item.title: Maxx Fire
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: The blend which most closely emulates a burning cigarette.
item.content:encoded: The blend which most closely emulates a burning cigarette. A full flavor tobacco, expertly mixed with the essence of warm, toasty fire, to give it the potent kick missing from other tobacco flavors.

item.title: Texas Boot
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: If you like tobacco, try this flavor out. Tastes like a cigarette (minus the smoke).
item.content:encoded:
We’ve bottled up the American spirit of a cattle ranch into a blend that tastes like a cigarette, minus the smoke, of course.

Legal Disclaimer: We received a notice from a Cowboy Tobacco Company that we cannot use the original name of this flavor on our website. Apparently, they own the idea of “cowboy” which just blows our minds since it’s nothing more than a profession. Cowboy Tobacco Company objects because they believe that Cowboy Tobacco Cigarettes & the term “Cowboy” have become synonymous. We thought that they actually became synonymous with bad breath, clothing odor, and potential for disease. Anyway, this is just a typical move by Big Cowboy Tobacco as they try to snuff competition in all arenas. Whatever, Cowboy Tobacco Company USA…we’re past your products anyway.

item.title: Cigar Passion
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: The closest thing to a Cuban cigar (minus the pungent, dense smoke clouds, of course).
item.content:encoded: This single-note flavor comes pretty close to a Cuban cigar, featuring subtle dark tones and an uplifting finish.

item.title: French Pipe
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A tobacco blend best enjoyed with a bourbon snifter and a low-powered device.
item.content:encoded: A tobacco blend best enjoyed in a tweed smoking jacket, while lounging in your office library, with a bourbon snifter, and a low-powered device.

item.title: Shade
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend for those who prefer the refined nuances of shade grown tobacco.
item.content:encoded: Some tobacco connoisseurs prefer their leaves to be sun grown. This blend is for those select few who prefer the refined nuances of shade grown tobacco.

item.title: 7 Leaves
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: One of our flagship tobacco flavors that has helped many a smoker kick the habit.
item.content:encoded: Some smokers prefer Marlboros, some prefer Camels, while others prefer Winston, and others still prefer Kools or Parliaments. All we know is, many an ex-smoker has successfully transitioned away from deadly combustible tobacco, into this flagship tobacco blend.
